name: Key Strokes
description:
A short prototype for my first puzzle game - this includes the first few levels to demonstrate the base mechanics. It's really just to test out the keyboard based input system for potential future projects, since I think the idea has some potential.

The gameplay is explained in game, but essentially you cycle through puzzle pieces by pressing the shown keys on your keyboard. 

It's likely there will be bugs at this early stage so the game may receive updates from time to time, so check back to see!
